text: Okay thanks, I didn’t know that! Sure I can help facilitate (maybe chat facilitator, this time?), but I’m also happy to make space for others to volunteer for these roles, so maybe you can put out a call and then if no one volunteers I/we can serve as backup?

elements.text: Okay thanks, I didn’t know that! Sure I can help facilitate (maybe chat facilitator, this time?), but I’m also happy to make space for others to volunteer for these roles, so maybe you can put out a call and then if no one volunteers I/we can serve as backup?

text: I can definitely serve as a facilitator, in whatever role you like! Just a heads up, we are at just 6 RSVPs right now, and Lorraine Reggin is the only person signed up who is not part of the organizers group :slightly_smiling_face: I just saw that Jenelle shared the registration link on a couple of the Psyc Facebook groups. Hopefully we see a bit more uptake before Friday. But this may also be a sign that it is that really busy time of semester.

text:
Great I’ll post to the group and see what happens. If not perhaps Emiko can be main facilitator and Gwen chat, to switch things up. I set a deadline by end of day Wednesday for volunteers to come forward so I will let you know. 

Thanks for the heads up about attendance Emiko. Let’s hope for th best but I understand if we don’t have a great turn out this time around!
